mapper.select: select su.id, su.system_company_id as companyId, sc.company_name as companyName, sc.company_type as companyType, su.login_name, su.display_name, su.last_login_time from system_user as su inner join system_company sc on su.system_company_id = sc.id and sc.delete_flag = 0 and sc.company_status = 1 where su.delete_flag = 0 and su.user_status = 1 and su.id = #{userId}
